DOC.brief_summary: In humans living of fruit and vegetables, hypertension is rarely seen. We wish to study if the development of hypertension has a connection to our intake of potassium. We know that fruit and vegetables contain a lot of potassium and we will simulate this intake by giving healthy subjects potassium as tablets.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Potassium on Physiological and Cardiovascular Variables in Healthy Persons
DOC.criteria: healthy age 1840 years old BMI 18, 530 nonsmoker daily use of medicine alcohol or drugs desire to become pregnant not using safe anticontraceptive abnormal results in the initial testing
